sentence: I got to enjoy the seafood salad, with a fabulous vinegrette.
explanation: The statement demonstrates a highly positive sentiment, as evidenced by the enjoyment of the seafood salad and the praise for the fabulous vinaigrette.

sentence: The wontons were thin, not thick and chewy, almost melt in your mouth.
explanation: The average sentiment score is positive and indicates that the user found the wontons delicious, as they were described as thin, not thick and chewy, and almost melt in your mouth.

sentence: Level 5 spicy was perfect, where spice didn't over-whelm the soup.

sentence: We were sat right on time and our server from the get go was FANTASTIC!
explanation: The customers had a positive experience at the restaurant, being seated on time and having a fantastic server, as indicated by multiple explanations emphasizing their satisfaction.

sentence: Main thing I didn't enjoy is that the crowd is of older crowd, around mid 30s and up.

sentence: When I'm on this side of town, this will definitely be a spot I'll hit up again!

sentence: I had to wait over 30 minutes to get my drink and longer to get 2 arepas.

sentence: This is a GREAT place to eat!

sentence: The jalapeno bacon is soooo good.

sentence: The chicken dishes are OK, the beef is like shoe leather.

sentence: Tasted like dirt.

sentence: One of the few places in Phoenix that I would definately go back to again .

sentence: The block was amazing.

sentence: It's close to my house, it's low-key, non-fancy, affordable prices, good food.

sentence: * Both the Hot & Sour & the Egg Flower Soups were absolutely 5 Stars!
